display_long_description:
Guided by an inner-rhythm spirit, take part in rhythm practices set within immersive visual environments. Enhance your focus and coordination while discovering the essence of your rhythm. Engage in drumming sessions driven by the science of human emotions - all of this achieved with just your bare hands, no controllers needed.

Rhythmscapes makes a groundbreaking leap, synthesising mindfulness and rhythm-based game mechanics into a single therapeutic experience within immersive VR.
 
# Key Features:

# - Music
[media]
At the heart of the experience are music sessions where the player must follow a rhythm pattern. These patterns begin with simple beats and become increasingly complex as the session progresses.



# - Visualisation
[media]
Players ascend through increasingly immersive visualisations, culminating in an epic climax that delivers unmatched emotional satisfaction.



# - Guidance
[media]
Players are guided by synchronised visual effects that help them stay in rhythm. The visual intensity increases with better performance, making each success even more rewarding.

-

In this Early Access version, the app consist of five sessions in one environment. With future free updates you will receive more environments and sessions.
